title: Masteries update
body:
Hi Dev team,

I was wondering about the current state of Masteries. My understanding is that the masteries will be expanded and I was wondering what are the niches you feel need to addressed with more masteries options. 

I was personally hoping to get an exp boost mastery kind of like a mini old Zil passive that is on when in range of an ally. 

Are there any updates when it comes to masteries and their current state?

replies.body: We'd like to add some new masteries into the trees at some point and had originally intended to do so during the mid-season patch. The scope of other changes we also wanted to make ended up being large for this time of year though. We put mastery work on hold both to keep total disruption at what we felt was an appropriate level and to allow us to focus on that other work. I expect we will get back to masteries in the second half of the year, though whether that'll be in the preseason patch or before it I'm not sure yet.

Give us Zilean mains some more efficient Keystones please! Thunderlords doesnt proc with bombs, Stormraiders is useless for support and Fervor is not strong! Nothing works well with him SOS help please <3

2 things:

1) Thunderlord's only really needs 2 bombs and an auto to proc which should be more than easy if you land the 2 bombs.

2) If you don't want to deal with that you could easily go into Deathfire.

> 
> 2) If you don't want to deal with that you could easily go into Deathfire.

Zilean can't proc Thunderlord's easily because:
- Putting 2 bombs on only detonates the first, which is only one hit for TLD
- The bombs detonate ~5 seconds apart from each other, making it impossible to proc thunderlords with only one auto
- You have to rely on autos to use thunderlord's at all in lane OR in teamfights because you only have 1 damage dealing ability.
I always go Deathfire on Zilean, that slow fire killing them and they are wondering how it happened is glorious :P

why not bring back "Adaptive Armor"? pretty cool and balenced mastery

in case someone doesnt know what it is.
Gain 4% of your bonus armor as magic resistance if you have more bonus armor than bonus magic resistance
OR
Gain 4% of your bonus magic resistance as armor if you have more bonus magic resistance than bonus armor.
That was an epic mastery to take on Taric or Galio top. I could build full armor and still have enough MR to not cry over enemy kat coming top.
I think it was because the mastery was a tank-only mastery and Riot ideally wants masteries to be viable on as many champions as possible.

Are you including new Keystones too?

As a Xerath player I find frustrating having to choose either a Keystone that does minimal damage and has some notable effect only if hitting 4+ enemies (DFT) or an unreliable minimal burst which works only if I go against my design archetype (which is constant damage from long range) and try to E-W-Q my enemy from middle/close range (TLD).

Are you thinking of adding more new masteries to tier 4 masteries (the ones with only 2 available), so there are 3 choices for us to choose like tier 2?

I'm also excited for a new mastery in tier 2 Resolve tree.
